entry.title: SB-SP-0054 Dinner Top Fold 9" x 4 3/4" x 2 9/16" Food Container - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 57.99

Send your delicious food home with guests in this paper take-out container!

From entrees to desserts, customers can enjoy their leftovers in style thanks to this take out Box. Great for your bakery, restaurant, bistro, or catered event, this versatile container is the perfect size for entrees, sides, and desserts. It's an excellent option to house a variety of foods, while the attractive color provides a professional feel for your customer's food-to-go.

With four flaps and a tab lock on top, this container ensures that your patrons' food stays fresh and at the perfect temperature, and also that no spills or messes occur during transportation.

This sustainable product is ideal for businesses wishing to reduce ecological impact. Plut, it features a poly-coated interior that makes it leak- and grease-resistant.

No need to worry about retrieving or washing. Once guests are done, they can simply dispose of this container for easy, hassle-free clean up!

Foldable paper boxes are great for take-out foods, rice, pasta, chicken wings, sandwiches and salads.

entry.title: Enjay - 8" x 8" x 5" Black Laminated Cake Box B-BLK-885 - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 56.99

Enjay Converters B-BLK-885 Details

Package and transport your carefully prepared baked goods with this Enjay B-BLK-885 8" x 8" x 5" black cake / bakery box! Made from strong recycled fiberboard materials, this box will hold up to your heavy cakes and is a great option for eco-conscious bakeries and catering businesses. Its convenient one piece, lock corner design allows box to be shipped flat for easy storage and then easily assembled in a matter of seconds when it is ready to be used.

This bakery box's shiny film laminated coating resists fingerprints showing on the outside of the box during transport, and is perfect for adding pressure-sensitive labels for personalization! Best of all, this box is designed for single-service use and can be recycled, making cleanup a breeze at the end of your event.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 8"
Width: 8"
Height: 5"

Enjay - 8x8x5 Black Cake Box B-BLK-885 - 100/Pack

entry.title: E.B. Box - White Window Cake / Bakery Box 10" x 10" x 5" - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: E.B. Box
Type: Disposables
Price: 83.99

Watch your delicious baked goods soar out of the door with this white window cake / pie / bakery box!

This box is a great way to offer your delicious pies, cakes, donuts, or your signature muffins on the go for customers. The viewing window also displays the product for quick and easy identification. The one piece design allows the lid to be opened easily and then tucked back into place to secure the contents. Make sure your bakery is complete by providing a durable cake box for your customers! 

Attractive Display

Featuring a crystal clear viewing window for optimal visibility, this box puts your delicious treats front and center for a mouthwatering display. Plus, it allows your customers to easily identify the contents as they transport the box to their next destination!

Durable Construction

Made of high-quality paperboard, this box has a sturdy one-piece construction that will protect your baked goods while they are on display or in transport.

Versatile Size

This box is the perfect size for holding cakes, donuts, cookies, or muffins. Whatever your needs are, this versatile cake box is is a convenient item to keep on hand at your bakery.

Easy to Store

The bakery box comes as a flat sheet for convenient storage.

Easy to Assemble

To assemble, simply fold and lock the tabs together at the sides.

entry.title: Inno-Pak Visions - Kraft Window Bakery Box 9.43" x 9.43" x 2.5" - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Inno-Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 113.99

Watch your delicious baked goods soar out of the door with this natural kraft window cake / pie / bakery carton box!

Whether you are packaging and selling cakes, pies, cookies, cupcakes, or your signature muffins, this box is sure to do the trick! Use it to pack HOT or COLD products. The viewing window also displays the product for quick and easy identification. The one piece design allows the lid to be opened easily and then tucked back into place to secure the contents. Make sure your bakery is complete by providing a durable cake box for your customers! 

MATERIAL: CCSUS, PET WINDOW
SIZE: 9.43x9.43x2.5

  • Patented, unique carton features a panoramic view is perfect for a variety of applications
  • Choose from 8, 9, 10, and 11” sizes
  • Superior strength and stack-ability
  • Made of durable CCSUS
  • Crystal clear, heavy gauge PET window

Attractive Display

Featuring a crystal clear viewing window for optimal visibility, this box puts your delicious treats front and center for a mouthwatering display. Plus, it allows your customers to easily identify the contents as they transport the box to their next destination!

Durable Construction

Made of 100% recycled paperboard, this box is built strong to ensure your items are protected while on display or in transport. The natural kraft construction means it's an eco-friendly alternative to traditional white boxes, yet it's just as strong as those comparable options. With this natural kraft box, you'll be able to increase impulse sales of your most popular baked goods, while reinforcing your commitment to the environment.

Versatile Size

This box is the perfect size for holding cakes, donuts, cookies, or muffins. Whatever your needs are, this versatile cake box is is a convenient item to keep on hand at your bakery.

Easy to Store

The bakery box comes as a flat sheet for convenient storage.

Easy to Assemble

To assemble, simply fold and lock the tabs together at the sides.

entry.title: Enjay - 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" Black Quad Cupcake Tulip Box With Insert - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 119.99

Enjay - B-TULIPQUADBLACK - 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" Black Quad Cupcake Tulip Box With 4 Compartment Insert

Easily distribute baked goods at your bakery or gourmet cupcake shop with this Enjay B-TULIPQUADBLACK 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" black quad cupcake tulip box. Whether you are packaging and selling cupcakes, pastries, or your signature cookies, this box is sure to do the trick! It has a convenient, one-piece construction as well as an insert to make transporting your delicious treats easier! Once it is assembled with its built-in locking corners, it has enough room to hold a small order of four cupcakes. Boasting a crisp, black color and trendy European design, this box will help you easily pack baked goods for your customers.

This box is built strong to ensure your items are protected while on display or in transport. Use it with the cupcake insert or on its own! The insert cutouts are 2 1/2" in diameter and are designed to fit 2" baking cups. It is even unmarked, so you can quickly add custom labels and stamps for a pop of personalization.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 8"
Width: 8"
Height: 6 1/2"
Insert Slot Diameter: 2 1/2"

entry.title: Enjay - 18" x 18" x 12" Flexbox Adjustable Height Cake/Bakery Box B-FB18 - 25/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 229.99

Enjay - 18" x 18" x 12" Flexbox White Adjustable Cake / Bakery Box B-FB18 - 25/Case

Package and transport your tiered and tall cakes with this versatile Enjay Flexbox white adjustable cake / bakery box. This box is designed with perforated sides that are easy to remove, so you can adjust the height to perfectly accommodate your cakes and other specialty desserts. This feature is exclusive to the Flexbox line from Enjay, so you can be sure you are getting the best product with the most flexibility for your business. The drop side construction also makes it easy to load up your cake and then remove it when it is ready for presentation. The corrugated body has a simple white exterior with a kraft interior, as well as a lock-style construction that makes this box easy to put together.



This Flexbox has a clear plastic lid that makes the contents easily viewable so you can check on your cakes and dessert. This box is stackable with like boxes, so they can be stored out of the way when not in use. Offer your customers a cake box that will make it easy to display, transport, and unload their cakes while maintaining their beauty and integrity with this durable, versatile Flexbox.

  • perforated, easy to separate sides at 12", 10" & 8" for an
  • instant flexible height
  • available in 10"/12"/14"/16" & 18" base sizes
  • perfect for tiered or tall cakes
  • frost proof window for easy viewing
  • drop side for effortless loading
  • lock style construction & stackable
  • corrugated body & simple clear lid
  • white exterior & kraft inside

entry.title: Enjay - 10" x 10" x 12" Flexbox Adjustable Height Cake/Bakery Box B-FB10- 25/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 99.99

Enjay - 10" x 10" x 12" Flexbox White Adjustable Height Cake / Bakery Box B-FB10- 25/Case

Package and transport your tiered and tall cakes with this versatile Enjay Flexbox white adjustable cake / bakery box. This box is designed with perforated sides that are easy to remove, so you can adjust the height to perfectly accommodate your cakes and other specialty desserts. This feature is exclusive to the Flexbox line from Enjay, so you can be sure you are getting the best product with the most flexibility for your business. The drop side construction also makes it easy to load up your cake and then remove it when it is ready for presentation. The corrugated body has a simple white exterior with a kraft interior, as well as a lock-style construction that makes this box easy to put together.

This Flexbox has a clear plastic lid that makes the contents easily viewable so you can check on your cakes and dessert. This box is stackable with like boxes, so they can be stored out of the way when not in use. Offer your customers a cake box that will make it easy to display, transport, and unload their cakes while maintaining their beauty and integrity with this durable, versatile Flexbox.

  • perforated, easy to separate sides at 12", 10" & 8" for an
  • instant flexible height
  • available in 10"/12"/14"/16" & 18" base sizes

  • frost proof window for easy viewing
  • drop side for effortless loading

entry.title: E.B. Box - White Cupcake Box With Window 10" x 10" x 4" - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: E.B. Box
Type: Disposables
Price: 109.99

E.B. Box - White 6 Pack Cupcake Box With Window 10" x 10" x 4" - 100/Pack

This window cupcake / muffin box is perfect for merchandising standard-size cupcakes or muffins in your front of the house displays! Its auto-popup design saves time and makes assembly quick so that you can offer fast and efficient service at your bakery. The viewing window also displays the product for quick and easy identification. Once the window is removed, you can recycle this box, making it a great eco-friendly option for your business.

Durable Construction

Made of durable, high-quality solid bleached sulfate (SBS) paperboard, this convenient, time-saving bakery box is built strong to ensure your items are protected while on display or in transport. Plus, it is unmarked, allowing you to quickly add custom labels and stamps for a pop of personalization.

Attractive Display

Featuring a crystal clear viewing window for optimal visibility, this box puts your delicious treats front and center for a mouthwatering display. Plus, it allows your customers to easily identify the contents as they transport the box to their next destination!
